SELECT * FROM
( SELECT anal_date ANAL_DATE ,AVG(item_val) ${ANAL_ITEM}_${WW_CODE} FROM wb_data_minute_${WW_CODE} WDM ,wb_anal_point WAP WHERE WAP.anal_point_code = WDM.anal_point_code AND WDM.anal_date between #{FROM_DATE} AND #{TO_DATE} AND WAP.point_class_code = #{POINT_CLASS_CODE} AND WDM.item_code = #{ANAL_ITEM} GROUP BY WDM.anal_date ) T_${index} (ANAL_DATE, ${ANAL_ITEM}_${WW_CODE})
WHERE 1 = 1
AND T_${index_1}.anal_date = T_${index_2}.anal_date
ORDER BY T_0.anal_date

SELECT WW.ww_name WW_NAME ,WAP.anal_point_name POINT_NAME ,WA.start_item_val START_ITEM_VAL ,(CASE WA.alarm_type WHEN '1' THEN '기준치초과' WHEN '2' THEN '측정상태이상' WHEN '3' THEN '전송상태이상' ELSE '' END) ALARM_TYPE ,WIS.highhigh HIGH_HIGH ,WIS.lowlow LOW_LOW ,WA.start_date START_DATE ,WAI.anal_item_name ITEM_NAME ,WAI.anal_unit ITEM_UNIT ,(CASE WAP.factory_code WHEN '9' THEN 'N/A' WHEN '0' THEN '공통' WHEN '1' THEN '1정수장' WHEN '2' THEN '2정수장' WHEN '3' THEN '3정수장' WHEN '4' THEN '정수장_암사' WHEN '5' THEN '정수장_강북' WHEN '6' THEN '정수장_자양' WHEN '7' THEN '정수장_팔당' WHEN '8' THEN '정수장_풍납' ELSE '' END) FACTORY_NAME FROM wb_alarmhist WA ,wb_item_standard_1 WIS ,wb_wellwater WW ,wb_anal_point WAP ,wb_anal_item WAI ,wb_point_class WPC WHERE WA.item_code = WIS.item_code AND WA.item_code = WAI.item_code AND WAP.anal_point_code = WA.anal_point_code AND WAP.ww_code = WW.ww_code AND WAP.point_class_code = WIS.point_class AND WAP.point_class_code = WPC.type_code AND WAP.anal_point_code = #{POINT_CODE} AND WA.start_date between #{FROM_DATE} AND #{TO_DATE} ORDER BY WA.start_date

SELECT WW.ww_name WW_NAME ,WAP.anal_point_name POINT_NAME ,WA.start_item_val START_ITEM_VAL ,(CASE WA.alarm_type WHEN '1' THEN '기준치초과' WHEN '2' THEN '측정상태이상' WHEN '3' THEN '전송상태이상' ELSE '' END) ALARM_TYPE ,WIS.highhigh HIGH_HIGH ,WIS.lowlow LOW_LOW ,WA.start_date START_DATE ,WAI.anal_item_name ITEM_NAME ,WAI.anal_unit ITEM_UNIT ,SUBSTRING(WPC.type_name FROM 0 FOR 2) FACTORY_NAME FROM wb_alarmhist WA ,wb_item_standard_1 WIS ,wb_wellwater WW ,wb_anal_point WAP ,wb_anal_item WAI ,wb_point_class WPC WHERE WA.item_code = WIS.item_code AND WA.item_code = WAI.item_code AND WAP.anal_point_code = WA.anal_point_code AND WAP.ww_code = WW.ww_code AND WAP.point_class_code = WIS.point_class AND WAP.point_class_code = WPC.type_code AND WAP.anal_point_code = #{POINT_CODE} AND WA.start_date between #{FROM_DATE} AND #{TO_DATE} ORDER BY WA.start_date
